<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Retrieve Overall Staking Data on Core Blockchain"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/staking/summary/overall"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns overall staking data on the Core blockchain, including information on validators, stakers, and amounts staked.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Overall staking data retrieved successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"integer","description":"Status code of the response."},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Additional information or message about the response."},"result":{"type":"object","properties":{"latestRound":{"type":"integer","description":"The latest staking round number."},"activeValidatorCount":{"type":"integer","description":"The number of active validators in the staking network."},"coreStakerCount":{"type":"integer","description":"The number of CORE stakers in the network."},"stakedCoreAmount":{"type":"integer","description":"The total amount of CORE staked in the network."},"btcStakerCount":{"type":"integer","description":"The number of BTC stakers in the network."},"stakedBTCAmount":{"type":"integer","description":"The total amount of BTC staked in the network."},"hashStakerCount":{"type":"integer","description":"The number of HASH stakers in the network."},"stakedHashAmount":{"type":"integer","description":"The total amount of HASH staked in the network."}}}}}}}},"400":{"description":"An error occurred while retrieving overall staking data.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"integer","description":"Status code of the error response."},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Error message explaining the issue."}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
